jobFunction: Project Management, Management, and Product Management
description:
Amazon Flex Investigation and Offboarding (Flex I&O) is seeking a candidate to audit the investigation cases received. This pivotal role involves meticulously auditing cases for the Flex I&O team, ensuring compliance is not only achieved but consistently maintained at the highest standards. The ideal candidate will embody a relentless commitment to raising the quality and performance bar, demonstrating an appropriate sense of urgency and adaptability in response to evolving business needs.

Key job responsibilities

  • Conduct thorough audits of Flex I&O cases to ensure stringent compliance and uphold high standards.
  • Identify both positive and negative trends through expert analysis, proposing solutions and improvements to enhance team performance and quality.
  • Maintain an unwavering focus on detail and exhibit self-motivation in all tasks.
  • Adapt swiftly to changing business dynamics while maintaining high-quality output.
  • Collaborate effectively with team members, leveraging strong interpersonal skills to drive continuous improvement.

Required Skills And Attributes

  • A strong sense of urgency and adaptability to navigate changing business needs.
  • Exceptional attention to detail, ensuring accuracy and compliance in all audits.
  • Action-oriented with a flexible problem-solving mindset.
  • Excellent interpersonal skills, fostering a collaborative team environment.

Join us as a Quality Analyst and play a crucial role in elevating the standards of our Flex Investigation and Offboarding team, ensuring we continually exceed expectations and achieve operational excellence.

Basic Qualifications

  • Flex I & O specialist or 6 months experience as a Quality Analyst
  • 6 months experience in GSOC/EXR/LMIR as a Quality Analyst
  • Must be in Good Standing.
  • Must be in the United States

Preferred Qualifications

Bilingual (Hindi, Spanish, Japanese)

Familiarity with process improvement methodologies and data analysis

Possesses strong interpersonal skills, strong self-motivation and enthusiasm
